nodes.text: Morth was a male Human who lived on the planet Genarius during the waning years of the Galactic Republic. He was employed in the retail sector, but later made a career for him self as an information broker in the city Oluna Biqua. Following the release of the gas Trinex-M in the city during the time of the Clone Wars, Morth gained the ability to use the Force, and was driven insane by his use of the farsight Force power.
